name: rcng-fullstack
description: Ruiru Central Neighbourhood Association - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:optimize: cd backend && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
scripts.install:all: npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate
